com.ibm.collaboration.realtime.gateway.plugin
Interface PluginRegistration

All Known Subinterfaces:
PluginImHandler, PluginPresenceHandler, PluginSessionHandler
public interface PluginRegistration

This interface defines the life cycle of the message handler plug-in.

Since:
7.5

Method Summary
 void customPropertiesChanged(java.util.Properties newCustomProperties)
          This method is called when the custom properties for a messsage handler plug-in are changed.
 void init(java.util.Properties customProperties, PluginStartupCallBack callBack)
          This method is called by the Gateway Core Plug-in Manager when the message handler plug-in is available for action.
 void terminate()
          This method is called when the plugin is being disabled or the gateway is stopped.
 

Method Detail

customPropertiesChanged

void customPropertiesChanged(java.util.Properties newCustomProperties)
This method is called when the custom properties for a messsage handler plug-in are changed.

Parameters:
newCustomProperties - - updated list of custom properties

init

void init(java.util.Properties customProperties,
          PluginStartupCallBack callBack)
This method is called by the Gateway Core Plug-in Manager when the message handler plug-in is available for action.

Parameters:
customProperties - - custom properties available for the message handler plug-in
callBack - - notification to indicate the Gateway Core Plug-in Manager that the message handler plug-in completes the initialization and is ready for action

terminate

void terminate()
This method is called when the plugin is being disabled or the gateway is stopped.
